# Towering Oak (Spell)
## Overview
[[Illusion Spells|Illusion]] ([[Glamer Spells|glamer]])

**Level:** [[1st Level Ranger Spells|Ranger 1]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 1st-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 1]]

**Casting Time:** 1 swift action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Personal

**Target:** You

**Duration:** 1 round/level

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Spell Compendium (WotC), pg. 221

*You evoke the power of the forests, giving yourself the ability to speak for them. You loom over others like a mighty tree dwarfs lesser plants*.

You draw on the oakâ€™s strength to improve your ability to intimidate your enemies. You gain a +10 competence bonus on [[Intimidate (Skill)|Intimidate]] checks and a +2 enhancement bonus to Strength.
